attributes.action: vacinate every lady in the u.k. with Gardasil  to protect them from HPV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gardasil is to be given to girls and women between
the ages of nine and 26. The vaccine protects against certain strains of
Human Papillomavirus (HPV) which is implicated in the development of
cervical cancer.  
we are campaigning so that every lady in the u.k. is vaccinated so they can also have the same protection against HPV

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "vacinate every lady in the u.k. with Gardasil to protect them from HPV."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14181.asp

Prime Minister's Office
